# Launch Bolt (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (crossbow bolt to be fired (\[1 sp])

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One crossbow bolt in your possession

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 130

*The crossbow bolt in your hand glows a bright red, then flies off at your foe.*

You cast this spell on a crossbow bolt, causing it to fly at a target of your choice as if you had fired it from a light crossbow, using a ranged attack roll. The bolt has a range increment of 80 feet. Any properties of the crossbow bolt (such as magical abilities, masterwork quality, and so on) or feats you possess (such as [[Point-Blank Shot (Feat)|Point Blank Shot]], [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]] \[light crossbow], and so on) apply. Drawing a bolt for this spell is a free action.
